thread.title: Shaan Rahman to compose for ‘Vettah’
thread.title_full: Shaan Rahman to compose for ‘Vettah’ - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Shaan Rahman to compose for ‘Vettah’
text:
The psychological thriller, 'Vettah', directed by Rajesh Pillai will have music composed by Shaan Rahman.
The music director had earlier composed a song, Manpatha , for Rajeev's previous film, Mili . Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
